One thing though,
On your site you write that it contains "coolest demos de=
pict NEAT evolving various mobility strategies for 3D artificial creatures.=
"
I couldn't find it. The demos included are:
Artificial Ant
Obstacle Navig=
ator
OCR
Pole Balancing
Symbolic Regression
XOR
Genetic Art (no source code=
)

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Ken" <kstanley@...> wrote:
>
> 
> 
> Matti=
as has given me permission to host DelphiNEAT, so it is now available at:
>=

page and the NEAT Users Page are updated to point there too.
> 
> For those=
 who haven't seen it, the executable comes with nice demos even if you don'=
t want to program in Delphi.
> 
> I also put up a version of DelphiNEAT-bas=
ed Genetic Art at:
> 
> http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/software/DelphiNEAT_Genetic=
Art.zip
>

ution experiment.

> ken
